decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the first&nbsp; floor elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p><span style="font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">Plan numbers: 3703 PPL3 REV B,&nbsp;3703 PPL1, Location Plan and&nbsp;&nbsp;Planning Statement</span></span></span></p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch, Two storey side to rear extension, Conversion of garage to habitable room, Single storey rear extension, Rooflight in front roof slope, External alterations (Demolition of side extension and rear conservatory)
